name: Necrophobia
description:
Restart your social life at your new high school, Heaven's Gates Academy!

~ Progress through the story and achieve multiple endings!

~ Stumble across new faces, and meet new friends!

~ Partake in a variety of activities with your newfound friends!

~ Laugh together, argue together, cry together- But more importantly, cooperate with one another.

Prove that which exists, or condemn that which shouldn't. Uncover the truth of Heaven's Gates Academy.
